issue.title: [C++] Implements dataset::ParquetFile and associated Scan structures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6161](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6161). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is first baby step in supporting datasets. The initial implementation will be minimal and trivial, no parallel, no schema adaptation.
